pages.text: $(li)The Obsidian is a hard block that is created when water flows over a lava source and can only be mined with a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/diamond_pickaxe)Diamond Pickaxe$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/netherite_pickaxe)Netherite Pickaxe$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:tools/end_remastered/end_crystal_pickaxe)End Crystal Pickaxe$(/l).$(br)$(li)This block has a very high blast resistant.
